snippet: The big exporters, meeting in Vienna, saw no reason to make changes that would affect prices, which have held relatively high this year.
abstract: Members of Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries agree to leave their combined daily quota for petroleum production at 30 million barrels; decision is expected to keep prices at their current steady and relatively high levels.
lead_paragraph: The big exporters, meeting in Vienna, saw no reason to make changes that would affect prices, which have held relatively high this year.

headline.main: OPEC, Foreseeing No Glut, Keeps Oil Production Level Steady
headline.print_headline: OPEC, Foreseeing No Glut, Keeps Oil Production Level Steady

keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations
